parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: Allows to filter the collections of result by the value of field "firstName"

parameters.name: $strategy
parameters.description: Configures the way to retrieve content in case of complex representations. Possible values are: "load" to all content and "reference" to only load root content and references to other elements.

parameters.name: nickName
parameters.description: Allows to filter the collections of result by the value of field "nickName"

parameters.name: $sort
parameters.description: Order in which to retrieve the results. Mutliple sort criteria can be passed. Example: sort="age ASC, height DESC"

parameters.name: dateProperty
parameters.description: Allows to filter the collections of result by the value of field "dateProperty"

parameters.name: boolProperty
parameters.description: Allows to filter the collections of result by the value of field "boolProperty"

parameters.name: $page
parameters.description: Number of the page to retrieve. Integer value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Allows to filter the collections of result by the value of field "id"

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Allows to filter the collections of result by the value of field "lastName"

parameters.name: $size
parameters.description: Size of the page to retrieve. Integer value

parameters.name: $depth
parameters.description: Configures the depth of content to retrieve . Possible values are integers starting from 1 upwards.

parameters.name: $depth
parameters.description: Configures the depth of content to retrieve . Possible values are integers starting from 1 upwards.

parameters.name: $strategy
parameters.description: Configures the way to retrieve content in case of complex representations. Possible values are: "load" to all content and "reference" to only load root content and references to other elements.
